name: pbjack Jackson
text: This Pizza is always amazing. Perfectly cooked crust with all fresh ingredients and delicious pizza sauce. Mod Pizza is better than most of the gourmet pizza restaurants Iâ€™ve been to. And donâ€™t get me started on the No Name Cake. Those â€¦More

name: Kyle Cornelison
text: Amazing food and very clean! The menu style is very unique, and the culture set here is very friendly. I have not actually ever heard of this place, but have seen it. I would recommend this place 10/10. 1st time visit, definitely will come again.

name: Marty Nickel
text: MOD may be the best chain-restaurant pizza on the planet! Great menu, easy to customize, perfect crispy crust (I haven't tried their thick crust yet). The flavor combinations on their menu pizzas are amazing! And, did I mention, their process are reasonable. Go get some MOD Pizza right now!

name: Alan Williams
text: 4 stars b/c it IS good and Im a fan of the fire baked thin crust, but why did the decide to double the size of the pizza that I always saw people taking home leftovers? Here a thought- go back to the smaller pizza and knock the price down... The Hut med thin crust is safe ... for now.

name: Beckie Gomer
text: We love our local MOD pizza.  We usually have a late Friday lunch date here and never have had a bad experience or pizza.  If you go often, download the app which gives you free stuff after so many points.  It is also one of the only restaurants I will sit inside during COVID. Keep up the great work MOD!

name: Bryan Kimmel
text: My pizza was great. Ended up going to Mod instead of another restaurant in the same area because as soon as I walked in they tried to take my temp. Sorry went out to eat not a doctors office.

name: Leo Green
text:
Very poor customer service, but good pizza.

Don't order from the curbside app.  They will just let your pizza get cold even â€¦More

name: Fe Artis
text: Iâ€™ve always had great dining and excellent customer service experiences at ModPizza, and the Wylie location was no different. The staff was very friendly, the restaurant was clean (including the bathrooms), and the pizza & lemonade were â€¦More

name: Fractal Out
text: Awesome food and experience at this location. Staff was super friendly. One of the employees named Issac was a huge help tonight with my order. Definitely will be back!

name: Sommer Molina
text: Great location! The pizza was great. It was my first time ever and they were helpful! The dessert was so good!

name: Chantal Brown
text: Really good pizza. Order at the counter and really fresh. Customer service is awesome and fast. The dough is freshly made and you can put your own toppings. I ordered Mega Dough with Tristan toppings. Pretty much vegetarian pizza and â€¦More

name: Carlos Z
text: I had never gone to Mod pizza before but my gf convinced me to give it a try. I dislike thin crust but they have a mega dough which Iâ€™m in love with. Brick style oven to make the crust perfect so many options and the staff are great! I really enjoyed the atmosphere and the pizza was delicious will come back again!

name: Jeff Pope
text: The pizza is always good and the service is even better!  The staff are very accommodating and are quick to get you your food during the lunch hour.  I eat here regularly (several times/month) and highly recommend!

name: Anteneh Tsegaye
text: Went to this location on 7/15/2020. It was a disappointing experience. The lady wearing a yellow cap and blue shirt was quite rude and got easily irritated when I told her I wanted to pay for my online order which was right in front of me. â€¦More

name: Maegan Benavidez
text: The pizza here at this mod pizza is always amazing. But even better then there pizza is the service!! Today my boyfriend and weâ€™re sitting outside with our small dog and a employee brought out some water and food for our little puppy. The little things mean a lot. Thank you mod pizza <3

name: Bennett Wong
text: Great build your own pizzas. Fast service, but avoid the dinner rush by pre-ordering on line.

name: Christin Woods
text: Went to support a the newest pizza establishment in Wylie. The sign said mobile and take out only. Walked in to place a take out order. I was told that Iâ€™d have to wait to place my order until they finished all the online orders. Wow.. you â€¦More

name: Aaron Kolega
text: The pizza is very delicious and it's fun for the whole family as everyone gets to choose exactly what they want on their pizzas.

name: Vienna Le
text: Though not a "local" restaurant (they have several locations) I will attest to say that they're friendly and offer quality service just like one! The employees are always offering assistance and give quality service to me every time. Their â€¦More

name: Kubik Ukraine
text: I am from New York City and had to leave the review for this place. Pizza is my #1 favorite food and once I bought the house in Wylie I was on a quest to find a good pizza and i am so blessed to live right by Mod Pizza because it hits the â€¦More

name: Johnnie Bea
text: Good pizza fast service perfect if your in hurry!!!

name: Mara Vecchio
text: First time to try this place. Ordered online for curbside. Got all the way home to find they forgot items in my order. And my luck, it was particularly my food of the groups.  I called the store to have to call back to leave a message about â€¦More

name: mihee lee
text: A few days ago, I went to a mod piza with my husband and daughter. I liked the interior. Topping was also good. But my pizza burned so much that I couldn't eat it.Bake the crust carefully.

name: Liz Sorto
text: Great pizza and nice variety of toppings. Your able to put as many toppings as youâ€™d like in your pizza at no additional cost. Crust is delicious too!

name: Sean M
text: I had never been to a MOD pizza and I'm glad we tried it.  I had an impression that it was like pie5 but it is 110% better.  The food was great, toppings were plentiful and the service was awesome.  We went early for lunch and it was quick â€¦More

name: Brent Melson
text: Great personal pizzas. You pay for the crust and all the toppings are free. Pizza came out perfectly, the crust was crunchy and cheese gooey. Need to try different combinations everytime.

name: Jackie Wright
text: Pizza was pretty good but taking stars away for the size. For the price I expected a little more. Beware if you are really hungry you might consider ordering elsewhere or just a single pizza for yourself.

name: Michael Mcdee
text: Was very dirty never seen this restaurant this bad. Will not eat at this one again.

name: Chelsea Stigers
text:
Pizza was great, and the cinnamon dessert pizza was amazing! Cheesy garlic bread seemed like it was missing something but ðŸ¤·ðŸ»â€â™€ï¸ everyone is different.
Very friendly staff, great selection of drinks and unique lemonades! â€¦More

name: Melvin Thathiah
text:
This place is awesome! The service is friendly and fast!

I like thin crust pizza, so Mod is a favorite. This is nothing like Pie 5, â€¦More

name: James Hill
text: They have some of the best crust I've ever eaten. The staff is always great too!

name: B090 0223
text: Good service. Quick. Kind of expensive. If you can swing $10 per person it is fantastic. It is a pretty clean joint. It has good food. The fact that you don't have to pay for toppings is a major bonus. My only other complaint would be that is kind of noisy. This can be remedied by eating outside if it is good day.

name: Natalia Elam
text:
Fantastic fresh, customizable pizza, with gluten-free and dairy-free options.
I had the gluten-free crust and dairy-free cheese pizza, with epperoni, spicy chicken sausage, basil, green peppers, mushrooms, anchovies.

name: Erica Agudo
text: Great pizza at a fantastic price. Can't beat that! Employees are always very friendly. Clean environment and food is always fresh. I prefer this pizza to our normal delivery chains. Absolutely love this place!

name: Lindy McMahan
text: Mod pizza is great! Not greasy and the toppings are piled on! The manager of the Wylie location is the nicest guy and the entire staff is so friendly!

name: Dawn Pace
text: Clean and friendly atmosphere.  This was my first time in, and the pizza was amazing.

name: Courtney Faison
text: My family loves coming to this place and making their own pizza (even if itâ€™s just cheese and sausage). The kids love getting to make decisions. The line might appear long at times but it goes quickly.

name: Larry Buie
text: Great pizza,fast service.good people.

name: Samantha Rieff
text: Fun build your own pizza place. Great service and very friendly staff! It was our first time visiting and they were all really helpful and accommodating. We will definitely be going back.

name: Brentley Melson
text: Great pizza! Awesome concept of personal pizzas. Pay for the crust and not by the topping so you can load it up. Glad Wylie is adding some different styles of restaurants. This a good one if you haven't tried it yet.

name: uhm chile
text: We absolutely love Mods Pizza. We will never eat at another pizza joint ever again. Their customer service is out of this world. They have the finest ingredients and amazing mega dough crust. Tell them Tony the Tiger sent you. ðŸ˜Š

name: Jordan Thompson
text: Tried this place for the first time today and it was delicious! Tons of topping options and everything was super fresh. Double thumbs up to the staff, they were SO friendly and checked all the tables to make sure everyones pizza turned out right. Great atmosphere. Will DEFINITELY be back.

name: Jared Stone
text: We tried this place for the first time last Sunday and let me tell you, this is one of the best pizza places that Iâ€™ve ever been to in my life. The pizza was great and the cheese garlic bread is to die for. All of the staff was super friendly especially Connor whenever he cleaned our table for us. Keep up the great work guys!

name: Jaclyn Brucker
text: Yes! All day long yes! We had to wait cause they were short staffed. But it was totally worth the wait!! Keep it up Murphy crew! I would put the menu closer to the door so new peeps can see it sooner. But still great food.

name: Feddie Wap
text: Huge HUGE shout out to MOD Pizza for coming through with a free holiday meal! Did not expect the surprise. I love their pizza.

name: Harsh Hapani
text: I really liked all the pizzas I ordered. What really makes this place unique is the way you can customize your pizza without any type of extra charge. You can add your choice of sauce, cheese and toppings all at one price. You can also dine â€¦More

name: Gary Piwtorak
text: Wow!  Was pleasantly surprised how good this was.  I had the margarita pizza and my husband had the meat lovers.  Both were delicious.   I'll definitely be going back!

name: Jenifer Lim
text: Their pizza is delicious, service is fast, and the staff is friendly and accommodating. This location is fairly new, but quickly gained us as regulars - their yummy pizza and people-centered environment really drew us in. I'm so happy to â€¦More

name: Diana Tyler
text: I Love Mod .... I'm from St Louis MO and is where I tried my 1st Mod, needless to say when I seen that a Mod was opening in my Wylie area I was ecstatic... VERY reasonable price, fresh ingredients prepared to my liking.  Luis is one of the â€¦More

name: Ashley Coady
text: MOD pizza is one of my favorite places to eat!!! Fast paced service, but a calm atmosphere to eat in. Pizza is always satisfactory & their no name cakes are super yummy!! A large range of toppings to choose from & a welcoming crew always keeps me coming back multiple times a week.

name: Terry H
text: Had the thick crust 11" make your own and it was great. They put as much or as little of the toppings you choose. They cook it apropriatly in their pizza oven so heavy pizzas take a bit longer. This is great as the places that just run it â€¦More

name: Marie Castillo
text: The pizza is delicious and the staff is awesome ! Iâ€™ve only gotten my pizza as an online order but itâ€™s always right and flavor and topping ratio is always on point. What stands out about this place is the service. I come in as a Togo order pick up and they still kindly engage with me every time. Thank you to the awesome MOD pizza team !

name: Sarah Hope
text: My first time ever experiencing Mod Pizza I have to say I will be back. The customer service was amazing, very friendly and helpful. The choices were endless and the pizza was amazing.

name: Leslie Rodgers
text: Every single time!!! 4 times now, Iâ€™ve waited over 30 minutes for a TO GO PIZZA! I have ordered to go 4 times and today takes the cake! The first I stood there for 45 minutes with two toddlers, the second and third time was just the being â€¦More

name: Louis Garcia
text: Sad to be sitting outside waiting for curbside pick-up. In a time when people should not be entering businesses, I had to wait 20 mins just for another customer tell me that i should go inside. Pretty shabby way to run a business where service is key. After the 20 minute wait all of my pizzas were cold and soggy.

name: Zara and Abe
text: We had 2 orders DoorDash to the house around 8 pm. This location closes around 10 pm so they had time and we did not order them last minute!!First order was good but the second one was made rushed, no effort and not what we wanted at all!! â€¦More

name: Michael Salzman
text: 30+ minute wait. Several people that came in after us got their food and left before we did. When my name was finally called, it was not the pizza I had built. I didn't realize until I got home that it didn't include any of the extra â€¦More

name: Brianna Davis
text: Can't fault the pizza, but the staff was pretty dang rude... one of them rolled their eyes when I asked for vegan cheese because I'm lactose intolerant. To give context, I am a tipper. I tipped Pizza Hut one time when I picked up my pizza. â€¦More

name: james brown
text: New place in town and very good. Food is great, variety and selection is better than some other local shops. The friendly faces behind the counter help with ordering for 1st time guests. I felt very comfortable here, we will be back

name: Marissa Bay
text: Very nice people and the manager is absolutely sweet. Theyâ€™re doing what they can during this hard time. Amazing food too!!

name: Jessica Jones
text: So delicious! Fresh ingredients, friendly staff, nice atmosphere. I would definitely recommend trying it out.

name: Mrs. MomOfThree
text: Great food and staff! My twins love watching their pizza being made. Thank you for quality pizza and great customer service Everytime!

name: Todd Wilson
text: My new favorite pizza place. Great customer service. Nice to be able to build your own pizza. also have a cauliflower pizza crust.

name: Tiffany Roth
text: Love the food, love the customer service more! The Manager Cheyenne helped me and she is just wonderful! She was running circles around the restaurant and still made time to make sure I was personally taken care of! Will be back for sure.

name: Rhonda McClure
text: The pizza is awesome and it's a cool looking restaurant. It is a bit loud and hard to hear so definitely not the place to go for a quiet private conversation. Upbeat talkative staff and they stay on top of keeping the place clean. In the regular rotation for my family!

name: Camden A. Baines
text: Great pizza the crust leaves much to be desired

name: Isabel Waldron
text: Excellent service and delicious pizza. We tried 3, Mad dog, Dominic & a white sauce bacon pizza. Loved them all!

name: Eunjoo Kim
text: I ordered 2 pizza today. Is it normal? It was really burnt. Disappointed....

name: Jeffrey Klimezky
text: Great food and service. It has the quality of a nice sit down restaurant with the speed of fast food. Perfect for a date night or just a quick bite.

name: Katelenn Jones
text: ate here for the first time today and loved it! the food itself is very good, and even if it weren't, chey's (i hope i spelled that right) hospitality alone would bring me back. she was very kind to us, a great fit for the relaxed atmosphere. will definitely return soon :D

name: Rodney Beasley
text:
Phone in Order of a large pie and arrived at time told.

text: Pizza was great. First time there. Will definitely go back.

name: Ryon Gross
text: This is our favorite pizza place in town. The pizza always comes out fast and the crust is a perfect thickness. We haven't tried the shakes yet, but it's next on our list!

name: Robert Herrage
text: Hard to beat a 1-price pizza with all the toppings you want. Cauliflower crust and side salad were good, too.

name: James Brown
text: Great pizza and one price for unlimited toppings.  Dairy-free cheese is available.

name: Matt Schnitzius
text: Great pizza. Lots of quality toppings. Reasonable price. Terrific service. Try the sweet tea.

name: Antony Hernandez
text: They don't know how to handle the sutiation they are busy. The lady just tell the people 5 minutes but i waited there for an hour for my pizzas. I saw her hanging up the phone to a costumers. One of them told me that doordash was calling them and they just hanged up. Donâ€™t buy there during the weekends.

name: Jenee P

text: Their pizza is amazing, I was a little disappointed that I was given the wrong pizza, but they gave me three pizzas to make up for it and the manager was extremely nice. Will come again!
